# Implementation Tasks: AI-Powered Content Generation & Optimization Tool - Phase 3

**Feature**: 1-ai-content-tool | **Date**: 2026-01-13 | **Plan**: [link to plan.md](./plan.md)

**Note**: This file is generated by `/sp.tasks` command from feature specification and implementation plan.

## Summary

Phase 3 implementation focuses on advanced features including Research Assistance (P3) and Export & Workflow Management (P3) as outlined in the original specification. This phase will add research capabilities to gather relevant data and references, export functionality for various platforms (blogs, social media, ad campaigns), and workflow orchestration for managing complex multi-step content processes.

## Dependencies

- User Story 1 (Content Generation) must be completed
- User Story 2 (SEO Optimization) must be completed
- User Story 3 (Quality Review) must be completed
- User Story 4 (Ethics Safeguards) must be completed

## Parallel Execution Examples

- Research service and export service can be developed in parallel
- Research API routes and export API routes can be developed in parallel
- Individual platform export modules can be developed in parallel

## Implementation Strategy

**MVP Scope**: Start with basic research functionality and a single export platform (e.g., WordPress blog export) to validate the core concepts.

**Incremental Delivery**:
1. Basic research functionality with Google SERP integration
2. Single export platform (WordPress)
3. Additional export platforms (social media)
4. Workflow orchestration capabilities
5. Additional research features (source credibility, advanced filtering)

**Success Criteria**:
- Users can initiate research queries and receive structured results within 10 seconds
- Users can export content to at least one platform with 95% formatting accuracy
- Workflow management provides real-time status updates for multi-step processes
- All features maintain the ethical standards and user control principles defined in the constitution
